title: ASML’s Best Month in Two Decades Puts Earnings in Spotlight
description: ASML Holding NV faces a potentially tricky earnings test, after the stock rallied 45% in little over a month on hopes that the accelerating buildout in artificial intelligence infrastructure will drive chip equipment orders.
content:

title: US biotech Nabla Bio, Japan's Takeda expand AI drug design partnership
description: (Reuters) -U.S. biotech firm Nabla Bio said on Tuesday it has signed a second major research partnership with Japanese drugmaker Takeda Pharmaceutical, deepening their use of artificial intelligence to accelerate drug discovery.

title: Most Investors Say AI Stocks Are in a Bubble, BofA Poll Shows
description: A record share of global fund managers said artificial intelligence stocks are in a bubble following a torrid rally this year, according to a survey by Bank of America Corp.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- A record share of global fund managers said artificial intelligence stocks are in a bubble following a torrid rally this year, according to a survey by Bank of America Corp.

title: US biotech Nabla Bio, Japan's Takeda expand AI drug design partnership
description: U.S. biotech firm Nabla Bio said on Tuesday it has signed a second major research partnership with Japanese drugmaker Takeda Pharmaceutical , deepening their use of artificial intelligence to accelerate drug discovery.
content: Under the new multi-year agreement, which builds on an earlier collaboration launched in 2022, Nabla will receive upfront and research cost payments in double-digit millions. The company is also eligible for success-based payments worth more than $1 ... [1295 chars]

title: AI jobs shock is coming and firms aren’t ready, Klarna CEO says
description: From technology firms to translators, the world has not faced up to the consequences of artificial intelligence wiping out swathes of jobs, according to one of AI's biggest cheerleaders in finance.
content:

title: Airtel partners with Google & AdaniConneX in building India's first mega AI hub in Visakhapatnam
description: Bharti Airtel has joined hands with Google to establish India's first mega Artificial Intelligence (AI) hub and data center in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh. According to a Bharti Airtel press release, the initiative is backed by an investment of around USD 15 billion between 2026 and 2030, and will be the largest of its kind in India.
content: New Delhi [India], October 14 (ANI): Bharti Airtel has joined hands with Google to establish India's first mega Artificial Intelligence (AI) hub and data center in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh. According to a Bharti Airtel press release, the initiat... [2631 chars]

title: Nobel economist warns of AI dangers
description: A winner of this year's Nobel prize in economics warned Monday that artificial intelligence offers "amazing possibilities" but should be regulated because of its job-destroying potential.
content:
A winner of this year's Nobel prize in economics warned Monday that artificial intelligence offers "amazing possibilities" but should be regulated because of its job-destroying potential.

title: Airtel-Google Partner For $15 Billion AI Hub In Visakhapatnam
description:
Bharti Airtel entered into a partnership with Google to set up India’s first Artificial Intelligence hub in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh on Wednesday.
This initiative will accelerate the adoption of AI across India, strengthen the country’s digital backbone and bring Google’s full AI-stack and consumer services closer to Indian businesses, a press release by the company said.
content:

title: Lyra Health launches ‘clinical-grade’ mental health chatbot
description: The move makes Lyra the largest company to launch a generative artificial intelligence product as a part of ongoing therapy treatment.
content:
Lyra Health on Tuesday announced its members will be able to talk about their mental health with a chatbot, making it the largest company to launch a generative artificial intelligence product as a part of ongoing therapy treatment.
